Package de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IJob<T>
    Interface for all jobs.
    IProjectJob<T> Deprecated
    Use LongRunningMethod and LongRunningWrapper instead.
    IRunner<T>  
    IStoppableJob Deprecated
    Use LongRunningMethod and LongRunningWrapper instead.
    LongRunningMethod<T>
    Interface for methods that take a long time to finish.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJob<T>
    Abstract eclipse job with support for JobFinishListener.
    AJob Deprecated
    Use LongRunningMethod and LongRunningWrapper instead to create jobs.
    AProjectJob<T extends JobArguments,R>
    This class implements support for Eclipse jobs.
    AStoppableJob Deprecated
    Use LongRunningMethod and LongRunningWrapper instead.
    AWorkerThreadJob Deprecated
    Use LongRunningMethod and LongRunningWrapper instead.
    AWorkMonitor Deprecated
    Use AMonitor instead.
    ConsoleProgressMonitor
    Prints the current work amount to the console.
    LongRunningCore
    Job that wraps the functionality of a LongRunningMethod.
    LongRunningEclipse
    Job that wraps the functionality of a LongRunningMethod.
    LongRunningJob<T>
    Job that wraps the functionality of a LongRunningMethod.
    LongRunningThread<T>
    Job that wraps the functionality of a LongRunningMethod.
    LongRunningUtils
    Methods for usage within other LongRunningMethods.
    LongRunningWrapper
    Job that wraps the functionality of a LongRunningMethod.
    SliceFeatureModelJob
    Create mpl interfaces.
    SliceFeatureModelJob.Arguments  
    SyncWorkMonitor Deprecated
    Use SyncMonitor instead.
    WorkMonitor Deprecated
    Use NullMonitor, ProgressMonitor, or ConsoleProgressMonitor instead.
